event.title: "I Love Free Software Day" in Madrid in Madrid, Spain

body.p: Join us for an evening full of Free Software, tinkering, and fun! The Madrid local group is once again teaming up with Makespace Madrid to celebrate I Love Free Software Day.
On the agenda: a guided tour of the makespace, engaging talks, and, of course, pizza!
